Nasturtiums are flowers that may be grown with the Farming skill. Level 24 farmers may grow a nasturtium flower by planting Nasturtium seed in a flower patch using a spade and a seed dibber. Nearby farmers will not guard this flower patch.

A nasturtium seed will take 20 minutes to mature. Once mature, it will protect any nearby watermelon patches from disease.

Planting a nasturtium seed in a flower patch grants 19.5 Farming experience. The plant can't be checked for experience. Only 1 flower can be harvested at a time granting 111 Farming experience.

'''Nasturtiums''' are flowers that may be grown with the [[Farming]] [[skill]]. Level 24 farmers may grow a nasturtium flower by planting [[Nasturtium seed]] in a [[flower patch]] using a [[spade]] and a [[seed dibber]]. Nearby farmers will not guard this flower patch.

A nasturtium seed will take 20 minutes  to mature. Once mature, it will protect any nearby [[watermelon]] patches from disease.

Planting a nasturtium seed in a flower patch grants 19.5 Farming [[experience]]. The plant can't be checked for experience. Only 1 flower can be harvested at a time granting 111 Farming experience.
